questions.clue: It is the only state to have been created by Presidential proclamation. (Hint: During the Civil War)
Mother's Day was first observed here in 1908
The nation's first sales tax went into effect here in 1921
It's motto is "Mountaineers are always free"
This state has the highest average altitude of any state east of the Mississipi River
Home to the site of John Brown's raid
Country singer Brad Paisley was born here
"From a town known as Wheeling ____ rode a boy with a six-gun in his hand...."
